```{r setup, include = FALSE}

#### Load necessary packages ####
packages <- c("knitr", "readr", "dplyr", "leaflet", "cowplot")

install_me <- packages[!(packages %in% installed.packages()[, "Package"])]
if (length(install_me)) install.packages(install_me)

library(knitr)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)
library(cowplot)
```
